originalText.text: Tax advice and filing are actually not as cumbersome when working with Ninth Ocean Strategies. Naoki is not only knowledgeable but extremely patient when it comes to answering even the simplest questions in an attempt to assist his clients to gain better understanding of their own tax situation. He really takes the time to understand one's individual situation (because we're all different) and what one is trying to achieve. Particularly for high income owners, strategizing is extremely important and he really takes the time to understand and guide. I enjoy working with him and will continue to do so as long as I can.

originalText.text: Naoki and the Ninth Ocean Strategies team provided exceptional service in assisting with the filing of my 2022 taxes. Despite the complexity of my tax situation, which included both personal and business elements, they managed everything with expertise and efficiency. I approached them quite close to the deadline, yet they were remarkably accommodating, offering clear guidance throughout the entire process. Impressively, I received my tax refund earlier than anticipated. Based on this positive experience, I am confident in choosing Ninth Ocean Strategies for my future tax filing needs.

originalText.text:
When I luckily found Ninth Ocean Strategies, I was dealing with new territory in taxes while also incorporating a business. In a short amount of time, I went from overwhelmed to completely caught up, ahead of schedule, while uncovering deduction options I was not aware of thanks to Naoki.

Naoki is the consummate professional and truly understands and CARES about your situation. He will give you the best advice for you situation. One key element I appreciate is his understanding of my own tax situation and how to approach it from both a business and personal perspective.

Truly, finding Ninth Ocean Strategies is one of the best financial moves I've made. I would recommend hiring them 100%.

originalText.text: Working with Naoki was the best tax experience I have ever had.  His his willingness to take on my complicated tax issues and ability to help me get back on track has made a big difference in my company's ability to run smoothly.  I would recommend working with Noaki to anyone in need of a true tax professional.

originalText.text: I highly recommend Naoki. He is extremely professional and a great communicator. His instructions and advice are always clear, and he took the time to understand my business needs. He handled the returns for my holding company, including navigating the rules of our foreign entity. He also did my personal tax return. Everything was thorough.
